channel.title: Someone Please Host My Server. <_<
channel.description:
Hello there! I am Alexia, and I NEED HOSTING!
Requirements: - FAST computer. - FAST internet connection. - Must have hosted in the past. - Be able to host at least 40+ players, no-lag. - Must have 3+ Rep here, on Moparscape.org/smf.
Server Information: - FULL runecrafting. - Rares are actually rare! - Most NPC's that Runescape has. - Need to actually work to get levels, items, etc... - Bigger and Better Armors! Barrows < Dragon < White < Other (need suggestions). - Working reputation system.
Benefits of Hosting: - Admin Position on the server. - Respect. - Able to give out reputation on the server.
Downsides of Hosting: - You should already know these if you have already hosted a server before.
If you are interested, please either post here, PM me here or send me a message in MSN (ally@runescapesentinel.com).
-Alexia[br][size=1]Posted at: November 05, 2006, 04:22:48 PM[/size][hr]--------
Anyone?
--------[br][size=1]Posted at: November 05, 2006, 05:47:19 PM[/size][hr]--------
Anyone?
--------

item.title: Someone Please Host My Server. <_<

@alexia wrote:

Hello there! I am Alexia, and I NEED HOSTING!

Requirements:

  • FAST computer.
  • FAST internet connection.
  • Must have hosted in the past.
  • Be able to host at least 40+ players, no-lag.
  • Must have 3+ Rep here, on Moparscape.org/smf.

Server Information:

  • FULL runecrafting.
  • Rares are actually rare!
  • Most NPC’s that Runescape has.
  • Need to actually work to get levels, items, etc…
  • Bigger and Better Armors! Barrows < Dragon < White < Other (need suggestions).
  • Working reputation system.

If you are interested, please either post here, PM me here or send me a message in MSN (ally@runescapesentinel.com).
